Ingredients.3: 6  mini graham cracker pie crusts (such as Keebler®)

Ingredients.4: 0.5 (16 ounce) can sweet potatoes, drained and mashed

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place the white of the separated egg in a small bowl and the yolk in a large bowl. Beat egg white and brush the edges of each pie crust with egg white. Add the second whole egg to the egg yolk; whisk together.

Directions.3: Stir sweet potatoes, pumpkin pie filling, sugar, butter, milk, pumpkin pie spice, and vanilla extract into the egg and yolk. Spoon mixture evenly into the pie crusts. Place pies on a baking sheet.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until middle of each pie is set, about 15 minutes. Cool pies for 15 minutes.

Directions.5: Place 1 tablespoon whipped cream atop each pie; gently press 1 walnut half into the whipped cream of each pie.
